statements: UPDATE CookingTechniques SET description = 'Boiling is a common cooking technique' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE CookingTechniques SET technique_name = 'Grilling' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE CookingTechniques SET description = 'A traditional cooking method using high heat' WHERE technique_name = 'Grilling'
UPDATE CookingTechniques SET technique_name = 'Braising', description = 'Slow cooking method in liquid' WHERE id = 2
UPDATE cooking_techniques SET description='Basic cooking technique' WHERE technique_id=1;
UPDATE cooking_tips SET tip_description='Use fresh ingredients for best results' WHERE tip_name='Fresh Ingredients';

UPDATE cooking_techniques SET technique_name = 'Sous Vide', description = 'Cooking method where food is sealed in airtight plastic bags and cooked at low temperatures for a long time' WHERE technique_id = 1;
UPDATE cooking_tips SET tip_description = 'Use a meat thermometer to ensure your meat is cooked to the desired doneness' WHERE tip_name = 'Cooking Meat';
UPDATE cooking_techniques SET description='A basic technique for cooking' WHERE technique_id = 1;
UPDATE cooking_tips SET user_id=3, tip_description='Use high heat for this technique' WHERE tip_id = 2;
UPDATE cooking_techniques SET description = 'Sauteing is a cooking technique that involves cooking food quickly in a small amount of oil over high heat' WHERE technique_name = 'Sauteing';
UPDATE cooking_tips SET user_id = 3, tip_description = 'Use a sharp knife for cutting vegetables' WHERE tip_id = 5;
UPDATE cooking_techniques SET technique_name = 'Baking', description = 'Used for cooking in the oven' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE favorite_recipes SET user_id = 2, recipe_id = 5 WHERE user_id = 3 AND recipe_id = 7;
UPDATE cooking_techniques SET technique_name = 'Grilling', description = 'Cooking food over direct heat' WHERE id = 3;
UPDATE culinary_tips SET tip_description = 'Use fresh ingredients for the best flavor' WHERE tip_title = 'Fresh Ingredients Make a Difference';
UPDATE Recipes SET description = 'Updated recipe description' WHERE recipe_id = 1;
UPDATE CookingTechniquesTips SET description = 'New cooking technique description' WHERE technique_id = 2;
UPDATE CookingTechniquesTips SET description = 'New description' WHERE technique_id = 1;
UPDATE Recipes SET description = 'Updated description', chef_id = 5 WHERE recipe_id = 10;
